questions.questionEn: Select the related number from the given alternatives: 121 : 11 :: 169 : ?
questions.questionHi: दिए गए विकल्पों में से संबंधित संख्या का चयन करें: 121 : 11 :: 169 : ?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: 121 is the square of 11. Therefore, the related number to 169 would be its square root. The square root of 169 is 13.

questions.questionEn: Find the odd one out: Car, Bus, Jeep, Aeroplane.
questions.questionHi: विषम को चुनें: कार, बस, जीप, हवाई जहाज।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Car, Bus, and Jeep are all land vehicles. An Aeroplane is an air vehicle.

questions.questionEn: In a certain code language, 'PAPER' is written as 'QBQFS'. How is 'PENCIL' written in that code?
questions.questionHi: एक निश्चित सांकेतिक भाषा में, 'PAPER' को 'QBQFS' लिखा जाता है। उसी कोड में 'PENCIL' कैसे लिखा जाएगा?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The pattern is a single-letter forward shift for each letter. P+1=Q, A+1=B, P+1=Q, E+1=F, R+1=S. Following this, PENCIL becomes QFQDMJ.

questions.questionEn: Find the next term in the series: 2, 5, 10, 17, 26, ?
questions.subject: reasoning

questions.questionEn: Pointing to a photograph, a woman says, 'He is the son of the only son of my grandfather.' How is the man in the photograph related to the woman?
questions.questionHi: एक तस्वीर की ओर इशारा करते हुए एक महिला कहती है, 'वह मेरे दादा के इकलौते बेटे का बेटा है।' तस्वीर में मौजूद व्यक्ति महिला से कैसे संबंधित है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The only son of the woman's grandfather is her father. The man in the photograph is the son of her father, which makes him her brother.

questions.questionEn: Find the missing number in the series: 4, 9, 16, 25, ?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The numbers are squares of consecutive integers starting from 2. So, the series is 2^2, 3^2, 4^2, 5^2. The next number will be 6^2 = 36.

questions.questionEn: Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term. Doctor : Hospital :: Farmer : ?
questions.questionHi: उस विकल्प का चयन करें जो तीसरे पद से उसी प्रकार संबंधित है जैसे दूसरा पद पहले पद से संबंधित है। डॉक्टर : अस्पताल :: किसान : ?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: A doctor works in a hospital. Similarly, a farmer works on a farm.

questions.questionEn: If the mirror is placed on the line AB, then which of the answer figures is the correct mirror image of the given figure?
questions.questionHi: यदि दर्पण को रेखा AB पर रखा जाता है, तो दिए गए आकृति का सही दर्पण प्रतिबिंब कौन सी उत्तर आकृति है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Mirror images are flipped horizontally. The figure on the left will appear on the right and vice versa, with the top and bottom remaining unchanged.

questions.questionEn: Find the number of triangles in the given figure.
questions.questionHi: दी गई आकृति में त्रिभुजों की संख्या ज्ञात करें।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Count all individual triangles, then combine small triangles to form larger ones. A methodical approach is needed to avoid missing any.

questions.questionEn: The position of how many digits in the number 5263184 will remain the same when the digits are arranged in ascending order?
questions.questionHi: संख्या 5263184 में कितने अंकों का स्थान वही रहेगा जब अंकों को आरोही क्रम में व्यवस्थित किया जाता है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Original number: 5263184. Ascending order: 1234568. The digit '2' remains in the same position.

questions.questionEn: A is the son of C. C and Q are sisters. Q's mother is B. B is the wife of P. D is the son of P. How is A related to D?
questions.questionHi: A, C का बेटा है। C और Q बहनें हैं। Q की माँ B है। B, P की पत्नी है। D, P का बेटा है। A, D से कैसे संबंधित है?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Q's mother is B, and B is the wife of P. So, P is Q's father. C is Q's sister, so P is C's father. D is the son of P, so D is the brother of C. A is the son of C. Therefore, A is D's nephew.

questions.questionEn: Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term. FAG : GAF :: RED : ?
questions.questionHi: उस विकल्प का चयन करें जो तीसरे पद से उसी प्रकार संबंधित है जैसे दूसरा पद पहले पद से संबंधित है। FAG : GAF :: RED : ?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The pattern is to reverse the first two letters and keep the last one. FAG becomes GAF. So RED becomes DER.

questions.questionEn: If 'CANDLE' is coded as 'DBOEMF', how is 'FLOWER' coded?
questions.questionHi: यदि 'CANDLE' को 'DBOEMF' के रूप में कोडित किया गया है, तो 'FLOWER' को कैसे कोडित किया जाएगा?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The coding pattern is shifting each letter by +1. C→D, A→B, N→O, D→E, L→M, E→F, so 'CANDLE' becomes 'DBOEMF'. Applying the same pattern: F→G, L→M, O→P, W→X, E→F, R→S, so 'FLOWER' becomes 'GMPXFS'.

questions.questionEn: Find the odd one out: Circle, Sphere, Triangle, Square.
questions.questionHi: विषम को चुनें: वृत्त, गोला, त्रिभुज, वर्ग।
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: Sphere is a 3D shape, while the others are 2D shapes.

questions.questionEn: Complete the series: B, E, H, K, ?
questions.questionHi: श्रृंखला पूरी करें: B, E, H, K, ?
questions.subject: reasoning
questions.explanation: The pattern is a skip of two letters each time. B -> C, D -> E. E -> F, G -> H. H -> I, J -> K. So, K -> L, M -> N. The next letter is N.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is the largest gland in the human body?
questions.questionHi: मानव शरीर में सबसे बड़ी ग्रंथि कौन सी है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The liver is the largest internal organ and the largest gland in the human body.

questions.questionEn: The famous 'Pattachitra' art form belongs to which state?
questions.questionHi: प्रसिद्ध 'पट्टचित्र' कला किस राज्य से संबंधित है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Pattachitra is a traditional cloth-based scroll painting, based in the state of Odisha.

questions.questionEn: Who is known as the 'Father of the Indian Constitution'?
questions.questionHi: किसे 'भारतीय संविधान के जनक' के रूप में जाना जाता है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar was the chairman of the Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly and is known as the 'Father of the Indian Constitution'.

questions.questionEn: The 'Battle of Plassey' was fought in which year?
questions.questionHi: 'प्लासी का युद्ध' किस वर्ष लड़ा गया था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Battle of Plassey was fought on 23 June 1757, between the forces of the British East India Company and the Nawab of Bengal.

questions.questionEn: The 'Palk Strait' separates which two countries?
questions.questionHi: 'पाक जलडमरूमध्य' किन दो देशों को अलग करता है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Palk Strait is a strait between the Tamil Nadu state of India and the Jaffna District of the Northern Province of the island nation of Sri Lanka.

questions.questionEn: A man sells an article for Rs. 450, after allowing a discount of 10% on the marked price. What is the marked price of the article?
questions.questionHi: एक व्यक्ति किसी वस्तु को अंकित मूल्य पर 10% की छूट देने के बाद 450 रुपये में बेचता है। वस्तु का अंकित मूल्य क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the marked price be MP. The selling price (SP) is Rs. 450. Discount = 10% of MP. SP = MP - (0.10 * MP) = 0.90 * MP. 450 = 0.90 * MP. MP = 450 / 0.90 = Rs. 500.

questions.questionEn: The average of 5 consecutive even numbers is 20. What is the largest number?
questions.questionHi: 5 क्रमागत सम संख्याओं का औसत 20 है। सबसे बड़ी संख्या क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The average of consecutive numbers is the middle number. So, the 3rd number is 20. The numbers are 16, 18, 20, 22, 24. The largest number is 24.

questions.questionEn: The ratio of two numbers is 3:5. If 8 is subtracted from each number, the ratio becomes 2:4. What are the numbers?
questions.questionHi: दो संख्याओं का अनुपात 3:5 है। यदि प्रत्येक संख्या से 8 घटाया जाता है, तो अनुपात 2:4 हो जाता है। संख्याएँ क्या हैं?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the numbers be 3x and 5x. According to the question, (3x - 8) / (5x - 8) = 2/4. (3x - 8) * 4 = 2 * (5x - 8). 12x - 32 = 10x - 16. 2x = 16, so x = 8. The numbers are 3*8 = 24 and 5*8 = 40.

questions.questionEn: If x^2 - 4x + 1 = 0, then what is the value of x^2 + 1/x^2?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: If the length of a rectangle is increased by 20% and the width is decreased by 10%, what is the percentage change in its area?
questions.questionHi: यदि एक आयत की लंबाई में 20% की वृद्धि की जाती है और चौड़ाई में 10% की कमी की जाती है, तो उसके क्षेत्रफल में प्रतिशत परिवर्तन क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Using the formula for successive percentage change: (x + y + (xy/100)). Here x = +20 (increase) and y = -10 (decrease). Change = 20 - 10 + (20 * -10)/100 = 10 - 200/100 = 10 - 2 = 8%. Since the value is positive, it's an 8% increase.

questions.questionEn: A work can be done by 10 men in 15 days. How many days will it take for 15 men to complete the same work?
questions.questionHi: एक काम 10 पुरुष 15 दिनों में कर सकते हैं। उसी काम को पूरा करने में 15 पुरुषों को कितने दिन लगेंगे?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Using the formula M1*D1 = M2*D2. 10 * 15 = 15 * D2. So, D2 = 10 days.

questions.questionEn: A train passes a pole in 20 seconds. If the length of the train is 300 meters, what is its speed?
questions.questionHi: एक ट्रेन 20 सेकंड में एक खंभे को पार करती है। यदि ट्रेन की लंबाई 300 मीटर है, तो उसकी गति क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Speed = Distance / Time. When a train crosses a pole, the distance is the length of the train. Speed = 300 / 20 = 15 m/s.

questions.questionEn: If sin(A) = 3/5, what is the value of cos(A)?
questions.questionHi: यदि sin(A) = 3/5 है, तो cos(A) का मान क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: In a right-angled triangle, sin(A) = Opposite / Hypotenuse. So, Opposite = 3, Hypotenuse = 5. Using Pythagoras theorem, Adjacent = √(5^2 - 3^2) = √(25-9) = √16 = 4. cos(A) = Adjacent / Hypotenuse = 4/5.

questions.questionEn: The circumference of a circle is 44 cm. What is its area?
questions.questionHi: एक वृत्त की परिधि 44 सेमी है। उसका क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Circumference = 2 * pi * r. 44 = 2 * (22/7) * r. r = 7 cm. Area = pi * r^2 = (22/7) * 7 * 7 = 154 cm^2.

questions.questionEn: In triangle ABC, if angle B = 90 degrees and AB = 6 cm, BC = 8 cm, what is the length of AC?
questions.questionHi: त्रिभुज ABC में, यदि कोण B = 90 डिग्री और AB = 6 सेमी, BC = 8 सेमी, तो AC की लंबाई क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Using Pythagoras theorem: AC^2 = AB^2 + BC^2. AC^2 = 6^2 + 8^2 = 36 + 64 = 100. AC = √100 = 10 cm.

questions.questionEn: Find the synonym of 'Candid'.
questions.questionHi: 'Candid' का पर्यायवाची ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Candid means truthful and straightforward. Frank is the closest synonym.

questions.questionEn: Find the antonym of 'Vague'.
questions.questionHi: 'Vague' का विलोम ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Vague means unclear or indistinct. The opposite, or antonym, is Clear.

questions.questionEn: Choose the correct spelling: 'Accomodate'.
questions.questionHi: सही वर्तनी चुनें: 'Accomodate'।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Accommodate', with a double 'c' and a double 'm'.

questions.questionEn: Identify the error in the sentence: 'He is one of the best student in our class.'
questions.questionHi: वाक्य में त्रुटि पहचानें: 'वह हमारी कक्षा में सबसे अच्छे विद्यार्थी में से एक है।'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The phrase 'one of the' must be followed by a plural noun. It should be 'one of the best students'.

questions.questionEn: Choose the correct preposition to fill in the blank: The cat is hiding ____ the table.
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान भरने के लिए सही पूर्वसर्ग चुनें: बिल्ली मेज ____ छिपी है।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: 'Under' is the correct preposition to indicate the cat's position relative to the table.

questions.questionEn: One word substitution for 'A person who is fluent in two languages'.
questions.questionHi: 'दो भाषाओं में धाराप्रवाह व्यक्ति' के लिए एक शब्द प्रतिस्थापन।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A person who is fluent in two languages is called Bilingual. Monolingual refers to one language, Multilingual and Polyglot refer to more than two languages.

questions.questionEn: Find the correct passive voice sentence for 'He is writing a letter.'
questions.questionHi: 'वह एक पत्र लिख रहा है।' के लिए सही कर्मवाच्य वाक्य ज्ञात कीजिए।
options: A letter is being written by him.
A letter was written by him.
A letter is written by him.
A letter will be written by him.
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The active voice sentence is in the present continuous tense. The passive voice equivalent is formed with 'is/am/are + being + past participle'. So, 'A letter is being written by him' is correct.

questions.questionEn: The idiom 'To beat around the bush' means:
questions.questionHi: 'To beat around the bush' मुहावरे का अर्थ है:
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom 'to beat around the bush' means to talk about irrelevant things instead of directly addressing the main point.

questions.questionEn: The synonym of 'Diligent' is:
questions.questionHi: 'Diligent' का पर्यायवाची है:
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Diligent means having or showing care and conscientiousness in one's work. Careful is a close synonym.

questions.questionEn: The antonym of 'Superficial' is:
questions.questionHi: 'Superficial' का विलोम है:
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Superficial means existing or occurring at or on the surface. Deep is the antonym.

questions.questionEn: Which planet is known as the 'Red Planet'?
questions.questionHi: किस ग्रह को 'लाल ग्रह' के नाम से जाना जाता है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Mars is known as the Red Planet due to the presence of iron oxide on its surface.

questions.questionEn: Who discovered the 'Electron'?
questions.questionHi: 'इलेक्ट्रॉन' की खोज किसने की?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The electron was discovered by J.J. Thomson in 1897.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is a classical dance form of Kerala?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन केरल का एक शास्त्रीय नृत्य रूप है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Kathakali is a major form of Indian classical dance, traditionally from Kerala.

questions.questionEn: The 'Right to Freedom of Religion' is guaranteed by which article of the Indian Constitution?
questions.questionHi: भारतीय संविधान के किस अनुच्छेद द्वारा 'धर्म की स्वतंत्रता का अधिकार' की गारंटी दी गई है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Articles 25-28 of the Indian Constitution guarantee the right to freedom of religion.

questions.questionEn: Who among the following was the first woman President of the Indian National Congress?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन भारतीय राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस की पहली महिला अध्यक्ष थीं?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Annie Besant was the first woman President of the Indian National Congress, elected in 1917. Sarojini Naidu was the first Indian woman President.

questions.questionEn: What is the capital of Australia?
questions.questionHi: ऑस्ट्रेलिया की राजधानी क्या है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Canberra is the capital city of Australia.

questions.questionEn: Which gas is responsible for the greenhouse effect?
questions.questionHi: ग्रीनहाउस प्रभाव के लिए कौन सी गैस जिम्मेदार है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Carbon dioxide is the main greenhouse gas responsible for the greenhouse effect and global warming.

questions.questionEn: What is the study of birds called?
questions.questionHi: पक्षियों के अध्ययन को क्या कहा जाता है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Ornithology is the scientific study of birds.

questions.questionEn: The 'Sanchi Stupa' was built by which emperor?
questions.questionHi: 'सांची स्तूप' का निर्माण किस सम्राट ने करवाया था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Sanchi Stupa was originally commissioned by the emperor Ashoka in the 3rd century BC.

questions.questionEn: Which body part is affected by 'Jaundice'?
questions.questionHi: 'पीलिया' से शरीर का कौन सा अंग प्रभावित होता है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Jaundice is a condition where the liver is unable to process bilirubin, leading to a yellowing of the skin and eyes.

questions.questionEn: The simple interest on a sum of money for 3 years at 10% per annum is Rs. 300. What is the principal amount?
questions.questionHi: एक धनराशि पर 3 वर्षों के लिए 10% प्रति वर्ष की दर से साधारण ब्याज 300 रुपये है। मूलधन क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Simple Interest = (Principal * Rate * Time) / 100. 300 = (P * 10 * 3) / 100. 300 = 30P / 100. 30000 = 30P. P = 1000.

questions.questionEn: If a man rows 5 km upstream in 1 hour and 10 km downstream in 1 hour, what is his speed in still water?
questions.questionHi: यदि एक व्यक्ति धारा के विपरीत 5 किमी 1 घंटे में और धारा के अनुकूल 10 किमी 1 घंटे में नाव चलाता है, तो शांत जल में उसकी गति क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Speed upstream = 5 km/hr. Speed downstream = 10 km/hr. Speed in still water = (Speed downstream + Speed upstream) / 2 = (10+5)/2 = 7.5 km/hr.

questions.questionEn: The length of a cuboid is 10 cm, width is 5 cm, and height is 2 cm. What is its volume?
questions.questionHi: एक घनाभ की लंबाई 10 सेमी, चौड़ाई 5 सेमी, और ऊंचाई 2 सेमी है। इसका आयतन क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Volume of a cuboid = Length * Width * Height. Volume = 10 * 5 * 2 = 100 cm^3.

questions.questionEn: The area of a circle is 154 sq cm. What is its radius?
questions.questionHi: एक वृत्त का क्षेत्रफल 154 वर्ग सेमी है। इसकी त्रिज्या क्या है?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: If 4/5 of a number is 20, what is 3/5 of the same number?
questions.questionHi: यदि किसी संख्या का 4/5, 20 है, तो उसी संख्या का 3/5 क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the number be x. 4/5 of x is 20, so x = 20 × (5/4) = 25. Now, 3/5 of the same number is (3/5) × 25 = 15.

questions.questionEn: One word substitution for 'A place where dead bodies are kept'.
questions.questionHi: 'वह स्थान जहाँ शवों को रखा जाता है' के लिए एक शब्द प्रतिस्थापन।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A mortuary is a building or room where dead bodies are kept before burial or cremation.

questions.questionEn: Find the synonym of 'Abundant'.
questions.questionHi: 'Abundant' का पर्यायवाची ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Abundant means a large quantity of something. Plentiful is a close synonym.

questions.questionEn: Find the antonym of 'Transparent'.
questions.questionHi: 'Transparent' का विलोम ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Transparent means allowing light to pass through. Opaque is the opposite.

questions.questionEn: Choose the correct spelling: 'Independance'.
questions.questionHi: सही वर्तनी चुनें: 'Independance'।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Independence', with 'ence' at the end.

questions.questionEn: Identify the error in the sentence: 'She is more smarter than her brother.'
questions.questionHi: वाक्य में त्रुटि पहचानें: 'वह अपने भाई से ज्यादा होशियार है।'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The comparative form of 'smart' is 'smarter'. Using 'more' before 'smarter' is a double comparative and is grammatically incorrect. The correct phrase is 'smarter than'.

questions.questionEn:
Read the passage and answer the question: 
The internet is a global system of interconnected computer networks that use the Internet protocol suite (TCP/IP) to link billions of devices worldwide. It is a network of networks that consists of private, public, academic, business, and government networks of local to global scope, linked by a broad array of electronic, wireless, and optical networking technologies. What does TCP/IP stand for?
questions.questionHi:
अनुच्छेद पढ़ें और प्रश्न का उत्तर दें: 
इंटरनेट आपस में जुड़े हुए कंप्यूटर नेटवर्कों की एक वैश्विक प्रणाली है जो दुनिया भर में अरबों उपकरणों को जोड़ने के लिए इंटरनेट प्रोटोकॉल सूट (TCP/IP) का उपयोग करती है। यह नेटवर्कों का एक नेटवर्क है जिसमें स्थानीय से लेकर वैश्विक दायरे तक के निजी, सार्वजनिक, शैक्षणिक, व्यावसायिक और सरकारी नेटवर्क शामिल हैं, जो इलेक्ट्रॉनिक, वायरलेस और ऑप्टिकल नेटवर्किंग प्रौद्योगिकियों की एक विस्तृत श्रृंखला से जुड़े हैं। TCP/IP का पूर्ण रूप क्या है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The passage explicitly mentions that TCP/IP stands for 'Internet protocol suite'. However, the full form is Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol.

questions.questionEn: Fill in the blank: The meeting was postponed ____ a later date.
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान भरें: बैठक को ____ बाद की तारीख के लिए स्थगित कर दिया गया था।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The correct preposition is 'to' when indicating a change in time for an event. The meeting was postponed to a later date.

questions.questionEn: One word substitution for 'A person who is always ready to believe things'.
questions.questionHi: 'एक व्यक्ति जो हमेशा चीजों पर विश्वास करने के लिए तैयार रहता है' के लिए एक शब्द प्रतिस्थापन।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Credulous means having or showing too great a readiness to believe things. Credible means believable. Cynical and Skeptic are the opposite.

questions.questionEn: The idiom 'To fall flat' means:
questions.questionHi: 'To fall flat' मुहावरे का अर्थ है:
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom 'to fall flat' means to fail to have an intended effect or to be unsuccessful.

questions.questionEn: Fill in the blank: I wish I ____ the answer to this question.
questions.questionHi: रिक्त स्थान भरें: काश मुझे इस प्रश्न का उत्तर ____ होता।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The phrase 'I wish' is used to express a desire for something that is not the case. It is followed by the past tense. So, 'I wish I knew' is correct.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following countries is not a member of the G7?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा देश G7 का सदस्य नहीं है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The G7 consists of Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom, and the United States. Russia was part of the G8 but was suspended.

questions.questionEn: The 'Statue of Liberty' was a gift to the United States from which country?
questions.questionHi: 'स्टैच्यू ऑफ लिबर्टी' किस देश ने संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका को उपहार में दिया था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Statue of Liberty was a gift from the people of France to the United States.

questions.questionEn: The 'Fundamental Duties' were added to the Indian Constitution by which amendment?
questions.questionHi: 'मौलिक कर्तव्यों' को भारतीय संविधान में किस संशोधन द्वारा जोड़ा गया था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Fundamental Duties were added to the Indian Constitution by the 42nd Amendment Act of 1976.

questions.questionEn: Who was the first Mughal emperor of India?
questions.questionHi: भारत का पहला मुगल सम्राट कौन था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Babur was the founder of the Mughal Empire in India.

questions.questionEn: The 'Great Barrier Reef' is located in which ocean?
questions.questionHi: 'ग्रेट बैरियर रीफ' किस महासागर में स्थित है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, located in the Coral Sea, off the coast of Queensland, Australia, in the Pacific Ocean.

questions.questionEn: The sum of the ages of A and B is 30 years. The sum of the ages of B and C is 35 years, and the sum of the ages of A and C is 40 years. What is the sum of their ages?
questions.questionHi: A और B की आयु का योग 30 वर्ष है। B और C की आयु का योग 35 वर्ष है, और A और C की आयु का योग 40 वर्ष है। उनकी आयु का योग क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Let the ages be A, B, and C. A+B=30, B+C=35, A+C=40. Add all three equations: 2A + 2B + 2C = 30+35+40 = 105. 2(A+B+C) = 105. A+B+C = 105/2 = 52.5.

questions.questionEn: If the compound interest on a sum for 2 years at 10% per annum is Rs. 210, what is the principal amount?
questions.questionHi: यदि एक धनराशि पर 2 वर्षों के लिए 10% प्रति वर्ष की दर से चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज 210 रुपये है, तो मूलधन क्या है?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: The volume of a right circular cone is 100pi cubic cm. If its height is 12 cm, what is its radius?
questions.questionHi: एक लंब वृत्तीय शंकु का आयतन 100pi घन सेमी है। यदि इसकी ऊंचाई 12 सेमी है, तो इसकी त्रिज्या क्या है?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: If (a + 1/a) = 5, what is the value of a^2 + 1/a^2?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: What is the value of 2 sin(30) + 3 tan(45)?
questions.questionHi: 2 sin(30) + 3 tan(45) का मान क्या है?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn:
Read the passage and answer the question: 
Climate change refers to the long-term shifts in temperatures and weather patterns. These shifts may be natural, but since the 1800s, human activities have been the main driver of climate change, primarily due to the burning of fossil fuels like coal, oil, and gas, which produces heat-trapping gases. What is the main cause of climate change mentioned in the passage?
questions.questionHi:
अनुच्छेद पढ़ें और प्रश्न का उत्तर दें: 
जलवायु परिवर्तन तापमान और मौसम के पैटर्न में दीर्घकालिक बदलाव को संदर्भित करता है। ये बदलाव प्राकृतिक हो सकते हैं, लेकिन 1800 के दशक से, मानव गतिविधियाँ जलवायु परिवर्तन का मुख्य कारण रही हैं, मुख्य रूप से कोयले, तेल और गैस जैसे जीवाश्म ईंधन के जलने के कारण, जिससे गर्मी को फंसाने वाली गैसें उत्पन्न होती हैं। अनुच्छेद में उल्लिखित जलवायु परिवर्तन का मुख्य कारण क्या है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The passage states that 'human activities have been the main driver of climate change, primarily due to the burning of fossil fuels'.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is the correct spelling?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सी सही वर्तनी है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Necessary'. Remember the word by 'one C, two S'.

questions.questionEn: What is the collective noun for a group of lions?
questions.questionHi: शेरों के समूह के लिए सामूहिक संज्ञा क्या है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A group of lions is called a 'pride'.

questions.questionEn: The idiom 'A penny for your thoughts' means:
questions.questionHi: 'A penny for your thoughts' मुहावरे का अर्थ है:
options: To ask someone what they are thinking
To offer money for an opinion
To give a small amount of money
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom is a way of asking what someone is thinking or feeling.

questions.questionEn: One word substitution for 'A person who studies rocks and minerals'.
questions.questionHi: 'एक व्यक्ति जो चट्टानों और खनिजों का अध्ययन करता है' के लिए एक शब्द प्रतिस्थापन।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A geologist is a person who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the Earth, as well as the processes that shape it.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is an example of an invertebrate?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा एक अकशेरुकी का उदाहरण है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: An invertebrate is an animal without a backbone. Spiders are invertebrates, while fish, birds, and mammals have backbones.

questions.questionEn: The 'NITI Aayog' was formed in which year?
questions.questionHi: 'नीति आयोग' का गठन किस वर्ष हुआ था?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: NITI Aayog, which replaced the Planning Commission, was formed on January 1, 2015.

questions.questionEn: Who was the first Indian to win a Nobel Prize?
questions.questionHi: नोबेल पुरस्कार जीतने वाले पहले भारतीय कौन थे?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Rabindranath Tagore was the first Indian and first Asian to win the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1913.

questions.questionEn: The 'Right to Constitutional Remedies' is guaranteed by which article?
questions.questionHi: 'संवैधानिक उपचारों का अधिकार' किस अनुच्छेद द्वारा गारंटीकृत है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Article 32 of the Indian Constitution gives the right to individuals to move to the Supreme Court for seeking remedies against the violation of their fundamental rights.

questions.questionEn: Which dynasty was founded by 'Babur'?
questions.questionHi: 'बाबर' द्वारा किस राजवंश की स्थापना की गई थी?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Babur founded the Mughal dynasty after defeating Ibrahim Lodi in the First Battle of Panipat in 1526.

questions.questionEn: What is the sum of the first 20 odd numbers?
questions.questionHi: पहले 20 विषम संख्याओं का योग क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: The sum of the first 'n' odd numbers is n^2. Here n=20. So, the sum is 20^2 = 400.

questions.questionEn: The length of a diagonal of a square is 10√2 cm. What is the area of the square?
questions.questionHi: एक वर्ग के विकर्ण की लंबाई 10√2 सेमी है। वर्ग का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Diagonal of a square = side * √2. So, side * √2 = 10√2. Side = 10 cm. Area = side^2 = 10^2 = 100 cm^2.

questions.questionEn: If (a + b)^2 = 100 and (a - b)^2 = 36, what is the value of a^2 + b^2?
questions.subject: maths

questions.questionEn: The ratio of the angles of a triangle is 1:2:3. What is the measure of the largest angle?
questions.questionHi: एक त्रिभुज के कोणों का अनुपात 1:2:3 है। सबसे बड़े कोण का माप क्या है?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: Sum of angles in a triangle is 180 degrees. Let the angles be x, 2x, and 3x. x + 2x + 3x = 180. 6x = 180. x = 30. The largest angle is 3x = 3 * 30 = 90 degrees.

questions.questionEn: What is the value of (3^2 + 4^2) / 5?
questions.subject: maths
questions.explanation: 3^2 = 9 and 4^2 = 16. Adding them gives 9 + 16 = 25. Dividing by 5 gives 25/5 = 5.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is the correct synonym of 'Subtle'?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन 'Subtle' का सही पर्यायवाची है?
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Subtle means so delicate or precise as to be difficult to analyze or describe. Faint is a close synonym.

questions.questionEn: Find the antonym of 'Harsh'.
questions.questionHi: 'Harsh' का विलोम ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: Harsh means unpleasantly rough or cruel. The opposite is Gentle.

questions.questionEn: The idiom 'To kill two birds with one stone' means:
questions.questionHi: 'To kill two birds with one stone' मुहावरे का अर्थ है:
options: To achieve two things at once
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: The idiom means to succeed in achieving two things in a single action.

questions.questionEn: One word substitution for 'A place where books are kept'.
questions.questionHi: 'वह स्थान जहाँ किताबें रखी जाती हैं' के लिए एक शब्द प्रतिस्थापन।
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: A library is a building or room containing collections of books, periodicals, and sometimes films and recorded music for use or borrowing.

questions.questionEn: Identify the error in the sentence: 'She has been living in Delhi since five years.'
questions.questionHi: वाक्य में त्रुटि पहचानें: 'वह पांच साल से दिल्ली में रह रही है।'
questions.subject: english
questions.explanation: 'Since' is used with a point in time (e.g., since 2018). 'For' is used with a period of time. It should be 'for five years'.

questions.questionEn: The 'Fundamental Rights' are enshrined in which part of the Indian Constitution?
questions.questionHi: भारतीय संविधान के किस भाग में 'मौलिक अधिकार' निहित हैं?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The Fundamental Rights are guaranteed by Part III of the Indian Constitution.

questions.questionEn: The 'Rani of Jhansi' was a queen of which Indian state?
questions.questionHi: 'झांसी की रानी' किस भारतीय राज्य की रानी थीं?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Rani Lakshmibai was the queen of the Maratha princely state of Jhansi in North India.

questions.questionEn: What is the unit of 'Electric Current'?
questions.questionHi: 'विद्युत धारा' की इकाई क्या है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: The SI unit of electric current is the Ampere.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is an example of a chemical change?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा एक रासायनिक परिवर्तन का उदाहरण है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Rusting of iron is a chemical change because a new substance (iron oxide) is formed.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is the largest freshwater lake in India?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सी भारत की सबसे बड़ी मीठे पानी की झील है?
questions.subject: gk
questions.explanation: Wular Lake is the largest freshwater lake in India, located in Jammu and Kashmir.
